Collection.Name: Clients | All
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Client = 1
Collection.Description: All devices detected by SCCM

Collection.Name: System Health | Clients Inactive
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary on SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary.ClientActiveStatus = 0 and SMS_R_System.Client = 1 and SMS_R_System.Obsolete = 0
Collection.Description: All devices with SCCM client state inactive

Collection.Name: System Health | Clients Active
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary on SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary.ClientActiveStatus = 1 and SMS_R_System.Client = 1 and SMS_R_System.Obsolete = 0
Collection.Description: All devices with SCCM client state active

Collection.Name: Clients version | Not Latest (1606)
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion != '5.00.8412.1006'
Collection.Description: All devices without SCCM client version 1606

Collection.Name: Hardware Inventory | Clients Not Reporting since 14 Days
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where ResourceId in (select SMS_R_System.ResourceID from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_WORKSTATION_STATUS on SMS_G_System_WORKSTATION_STATUS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where DATEDIFF(dd,SMS_G_System_WORKSTATION_STATUS.LastHardwareScan,GetDate()) > 14)
Collection.Description: All devices with SCCM client that have not communicated with hardware inventory over 14 days

Collection.Name: Clients | No
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Client = 0 OR SMS_R_System.Client is NULL
Collection.Description: All devices without SCCM client installed

Collection.Name: System Health | Obsolete
Collection.Query: select * from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Obsolete = 1
Collection.Description: All devices with SCCM client state obsolete

Collection.Name: Workstations | Active
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary on SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where (SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT%Workstation%' or SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion = 'WindowsÂ 7 Entreprise 6.1') and SMS_G_System_CH_ClientSummary.ClientActiveStatus = 1 and SMS_R_System.Client = 1 and SMS_R_System.Obsolete = 0
Collection.Description: All workstations with active state

Collection.Name: Laptops | All
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE on SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE.ChassisTypes in ('8', '9', '10', '11', '12', '14', '18', '21')
Collection.Description: All laptops

Collection.Name: Servers | All
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server%'
Collection.Description: All servers

Collection.Name: Servers | Physical
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ResourceId not in (select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_R_System.IsVirtualMachine = 'True') and SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT%Server%'
Collection.Description: All physical servers

Collection.Name: Servers | Virtual
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.IsVirtualMachine = 'True' and SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT%Server%'
Collection.Description: All virtual servers

Collection.Name: Workstations | All
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation%'
Collection.Description: All workstations

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 7
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 6.1%'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 7 operating system

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 8
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 6.2%'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 8 operating system

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 8.1
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 6.3%'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 8.1 operating system

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows XP
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 5.1%' or OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 5.2%'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows XP operating system

Collection.Name: Servers | Windows 2008 and 2008 R2
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.0%' or OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.1%'
Collection.Description: All servers with Windows 2008 or 2008 R2 operating system

Collection.Name: Servers | Windows 2012 and 2012 R2
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.2%' or OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.3%'
Collection.Description: All servers with Windows 2012 or 2012 R2 operating system

Collection.Name: Servers | Windows 2003 and 2003 R2
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 5.2%'
Collection.Description: All servers with Windows 2003 or 2003 R2 operating system

Collection.Name: Systems | Created Since 24h
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.CreationDate FROM SMS_R_System WHERE DateDiff(dd,SMS_R_System.CreationDate, GetDate()) <= 1
Collection.Description: All systems created in the last 24 hours

Collection.Name: SCCM | Console
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS on SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName like '%Configuration Manager Console%'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM console installed

Collection.Name: SCCM | Site System
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.SystemRoles = 'SMS Site System'
Collection.Description: All systems that is SCCM site system

Collection.Name: SCCM | Site Servers
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.SystemRoles = 'SMS Site Server'
Collection.Description: All systems that is SCCM site server

Collection.Name: SCCM | Distribution Points
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.SystemRoles = 'SMS Distribution Point'
Collection.Description: All systems that is SCCM distribution point

Collection.Name: Windows Update Agent | Outdated Version Win7 RTM and Lower
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_WINDOWSUPDATEAGENTVERSION on SMS_G_System_WINDOWSUPDATEAGENTVERSION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_WINDOWSUPDATEAGENTVERSION.Version < '7.6.7600.256' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Version <= '6.1.7600'
Collection.Description: All systems with windows update agent with outdated version Win7 RTM and lower

Collection.Name: Windows Update Agent | Outdated Version Win7 SP1 and Higher
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_WINDOWSUPDATEAGENTVERSION on SMS_G_System_WINDOWSUPDATEAGENTVERSION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_WINDOWSUPDATEAGENTVERSION.Version < '7.6.7600.320' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Version >= '6.1.7601'
Collection.Description: All systems with windows update agent with outdated version Win7 SP1 and higher

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Android
Collection.Query: SELECT SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client FROM SMS_R_System INNER JOIN SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION ON SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId WHERE SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.Platform like 'Android%'
Collection.Description: All Android modible devices

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Iphone
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_DEVICE_COMPUTERSYSTEM on SMS_G_System_DEVICE_COMPUTERSYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_DEVICE_COMPUTERSYSTEM.DeviceModel like '%Iphone%'
Collection.Description: All Iphone modible devices

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Ipad
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_DEVICE_COMPUTERSYSTEM on SMS_G_System_DEVICE_COMPUTERSYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_DEVICE_COMPUTERSYSTEM.DeviceModel like '%Ipad%'
Collection.Description: All Ipad mobile devices

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Windows Phone 8
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION on SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.Platform = 'Windows Phone' and SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.Version like '8.0%'
Collection.Description: All Windows 8 mobile devices

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Windows Phone 8.1
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION on SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.Platform = 'Windows Phone' and SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.Version like '8.1%'
Collection.Description: All Windows 8.1 mobile devices

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Microsoft Surface
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Model like '%Surface%'
Collection.Description: All Windows RT mobile devices

Collection.Name: System Health | Disabled
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.UserAccountControl ='4098'
Collection.Description: All systems with client state disabled

Collection.Name: Systems | x86
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.SystemType = 'X86-based PC'
Collection.Description: All systems with 32-bit system type

Collection.Name: Systems | x64
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.SystemType = 'X64-based PC'
Collection.Description: All systems with 64-bit system type

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 CU1
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.7958.1203'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 CU1 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 CU2
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.7958.1303'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 CU2 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 CU3
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.7958.1401'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 CU3 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 CU4
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.7958.1501'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 CU4 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 CU5
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.7958.1604'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 CU5 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 CU0
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.7958.1000'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 CU0 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 SP1
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.8239.1000'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 SP1 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 SP1 CU1
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.8239.1203'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 SP1 CU1 installed

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 10.0%'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 10 operating system

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 SP1 CU2
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.8239.1301'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 SP1 CU2 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | 1511
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.8325.1000'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version 1511 installed

Collection.Name: Laptops | Dell
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%Dell%'
Collection.Description: All laptops with Dell manufacturer

Collection.Name: Laptops | Lenovo
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%Lenovo%'
Collection.Description: All laptops with Lenovo manufacturer

Collection.Name: Laptops | HP
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%HP%'
Collection.Description: All laptops with HP manufacturer

Collection.Name: Clients Version | R2 SP1 CU3
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.8239.1403'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version R2 SP1 CU3 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | 1602
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.8355.1000'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version 1602 installed

Collection.Name: Clients Version | 1606
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion like '5.00.8412.100%'
Collection.Description: All systems with SCCM client version 1606 installed

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Microsoft Surface 3
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Model = 'Surface Pro 3' OR SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Model = 'Surface 3'
Collection.Description: All Microsoft Surface 3

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Microsoft Surface 4
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Model = 'Surface Pro 4'
Collection.Description: All Microsoft Surface 4

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | Windows Phone 10
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION on SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.Platform = 'Windows Phone' and SMS_G_System_DEVICE_OSINFORMATION.Version like '10%'
Collection.Description: All Windows Phone 10

Collection.Name: Mobile Devices | All
Collection.Query: select * from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientType = 3
Collection.Description: All Mobile Devices

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 v1507
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Build like '10.0.10240%'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 10 operating system v1507

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 v1511
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Build like '10.0.10586%'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 10 operating system v1511

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 v1607
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Build like '10.0.14393%'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 10 operating system v1607

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 Current Branch (CB)
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Workstation 10.0%' and SMS_R_System.OSBranch = '0'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 10 CB

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 Current Branch for Business (CBB)
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Workstation 10.0%' and SMS_R_System.OSBranch = '1'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 10 CBB

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 Long Term Servicing Branch (LTSB)
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Workstation 10.0%' and SMS_R_System.OSBranch = '2'
Collection.Description: All workstations with Windows 10 LTSB

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 Support State - Current
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System LEFT OUTER JOIN SMS_WindowsServicingStates ON SMS_WindowsServicingStates.Build = SMS_R_System.build01 AND SMS_WindowsServicingStates.branch = SMS_R_System.osbranch01 where SMS_WindowsServicingStates.State = '2'
Collection.Description: Windows 10 Support State - Current

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 Support State - Expired Soon
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System LEFT OUTER JOIN SMS_WindowsServicingStates ON SMS_WindowsServicingStates.Build = SMS_R_System.build01 AND SMS_WindowsServicingStates.branch = SMS_R_System.osbranch01 where SMS_WindowsServicingStates.State = '3'
Collection.Description: Windows 10 Support State - Expired Soon

Collection.Name: Workstations | Windows 10 Support State - Expired
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System LEFT OUTER JOIN SMS_WindowsServicingStates ON SMS_WindowsServicingStates.Build = SMS_R_System.build01 AND SMS_WindowsServicingStates.branch = SMS_R_System.osbranch01 where SMS_WindowsServicingStates.State = '4'
Collection.Description: Windows 10 Support State - Expired

Collection.Name: Servers | Windows 2016
Collection.Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 10%'
Collection.Description: All Servers with Windows 2016
